typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AdvertismentId as string,
		AdvertismentDateDay as integer,
		AdvertismentDateMonth as integer,
		AdvertismentDateYear as integer,
		AdvertismentEndDay as integer,
		AdvertismentEndMonth as integer,
		AdvertismentEndYear as integer,
		TotalSpent as integer,
		actionClicks as integer,
		adUnitClicks as integer,
		approximateUniqueImpressions as integer,
		cardClicks as integer,
		cardImpressions as integer,
		clicks as integer,
		commentLikes as integer,
		comments as integer,
		companyPageClicks as integer,
		conversionValueInLocalCurrency as integer,
		costInLocalCurrency as string,
		costInUsd as string,
		externalWebsiteConversions as integer,
		externalWebsitePostClickConversions as integer,
		externalWebsitePostViewConversions as integer,
		follows as integer,
		fullScreenPlays as integer,
		impressions as integer,
		landingPageClicks as integer,
		leadGenerationMailContactInfoShares as integer,
		leadGenerationMailInterestedClicks as integer,
		likes as integer,
		oneClickLeadFormOpens as integer,
		oneClickLeads as integer,
		opens as integer,
		otherEngagements as integer,
		returnOnAreactionsdSpend as integer,
		sends as integer,
		shares as integer,
		textUrlClicks as integer,
		totalEngagements as integer,
		videoCompletions as integer,
		videoFirstQuartileCompletions as integer,
		videoMidpointCompletions as integer,
		videoStarts as integer,
		videoThirdQuartileCompletions as integer,
		videoViews as integer,
		viralCardClicks as integer,
		viralCardImpressions as integer,
		viralClicks as integer,
		viralCommentLikes as integer,
		viralComments as integer,
		viralCompanyPageClicks as integer,
		viralExternalWebsiteConversions as integer,
		viralExternalWebsitePostClickConversions as integer,
		viralExternalWebsitePostViewConversions as integer,
		viralFollows as integer,
		viralFullScreenPlays as integer,
		viralImpressions as integer,
		viralLandingPageClicks as integer,
		viralLikes as integer,
		viralOneClickLeadFormOpens as integer,
		viralOneClickLeads as integer,
		viralOtherEngagements as integer,
		viralReactions as integer,
		viralShares as integer,
		viralTotalEngagements as integer,
		viralVideoCompletions as integer,
		viralVideoFirstQuartileCompletions as integer,
		viralVideoMidpointCompletions as integer,
		viralVideoStarts as integer,
		viralVideoThirdQuartileCompletions as integer,
		viralVideoViews as integer,
		reactions as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AdvertismentDetailLinkedinStage
AdvertismentDetailLinkedinStage derive(AdvertismentId = replace(replace(AdvertismentId, '["urn:li:sponsoredCreative:',''),'"]',''),
		AdvertismentStartDate = toDate(toString(AdvertismentDateYear) + '-' + toString(AdvertismentDateMonth) +  '-'+ toString(AdvertismentDateDay) , 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		AdvertismentEndDate = toDate(toString(AdvertismentEndYear) + '-' + toString(AdvertismentEndMonth) +  '-'+ toString(AdvertismentEndDay) , 'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> PrepareColumns
PrepareColumns sink(input(
		AdvertismentId as integer,
		AdvertismentStartDate as timestamp,
		AdvertismentEndDate as timestamp,
		TotalSpent as integer,
		ActionClicks as integer,
		AdUnitClicks as integer,
		ApproximateUniqueImpressions as integer,
		CardClicks as integer,
		CardImpressions as integer,
		Clicks as integer,
		CommentLikes as integer,
		Comments as integer,
		CompanyPageClicks as integer,
		ConversionValueInLocalCurrency as integer,
		CostInLocalCurrency as double,
		CostInUsd as double,
		ExternalWebsiteConversions as integer,
		ExternalWebsitePostClickConversions as integer,
		ExternalWebsitePostViewConversions as integer,
		Follows as integer,
		FullScreenPlays as integer,
		Impressions as integer,
		LandingPageClicks as integer,
		LeadGenerationMailContactInfoShares as integer,
		LeadGenerationMailInterestedClicks as integer,
		Likes as integer,
		OneClickLeadFormOpens as integer,
		OneClickLeads as integer,
		Opens as integer,
		OtherEngagements as integer,
		ReturnOnAreactionsdSpend as integer,
		Sends as integer,
		Shares as integer,
		TextUrlClicks as integer,
		TotalEngagements as integer,
		VideoCompletions as integer,
		VideoFirstQuartileCompletions as integer,
		VideoMidpointCompletions as integer,
		VideoStarts as integer,
		VideoThirdQuartileCompletions as integer,
		VideoViews as integer,
		ViralCardClicks as integer,
		ViralCardImpressions as integer,
		ViralClicks as integer,
		ViralCommentLikes as integer,
		ViralComments as integer,
		ViralCompanyPageClicks as integer,
		ViralExternalWebsiteConversions as integer,
		ViralExternalWebsitePostClickConversions as integer,
		ViralExternalWebsitePostViewConversions as integer,
		ViralFollows as integer,
		ViralFullScreenPlays as integer,
		ViralImpressions as integer,
		ViralLandingPageClicks as integer,
		ViralLikes as integer,
		ViralOneClickLeadFormOpens as integer,
		ViralOneClickLeads as integer,
		ViralOtherEngagements as integer,
		ViralReactions as integer,
		ViralShares as integer,
		ViralTotalEngagements as integer,
		ViralVideoCompletions as integer,
		ViralVideoFirstQuartileCompletions as integer,
		ViralVideoMidpointCompletions as integer,
		ViralVideoStarts as integer,
		ViralVideoThirdQuartileCompletions as integer,
		ViralVideoViews as integer,
		Reactions as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		AdvertismentId,
		AdvertismentStartDate,
		AdvertismentEndDate,
		TotalSpent,
		ActionClicks = actionClicks,
		AdUnitClicks = adUnitClicks,
		ApproximateUniqueImpressions = approximateUniqueImpressions,
		CardClicks = cardClicks,
		CardImpressions = cardImpressions,
		Clicks = clicks,
		CommentLikes = commentLikes,
		Comments = comments,
		CompanyPageClicks = companyPageClicks,
		ConversionValueInLocalCurrency = conversionValueInLocalCurrency,
		CostInLocalCurrency = costInLocalCurrency,
		CostInUsd = costInUsd,
		ExternalWebsiteConversions = externalWebsiteConversions,
		ExternalWebsitePostClickConversions = externalWebsitePostClickConversions,
		ExternalWebsitePostViewConversions = externalWebsitePostViewConversions,
		Follows = follows,
		FullScreenPlays = fullScreenPlays,
		Impressions = impressions,
		LandingPageClicks = landingPageClicks,
		LeadGenerationMailContactInfoShares = leadGenerationMailContactInfoShares,
		LeadGenerationMailInterestedClicks = leadGenerationMailInterestedClicks,
		Likes = likes,
		OneClickLeadFormOpens = oneClickLeadFormOpens,
		OneClickLeads = oneClickLeads,
		Opens = opens,
		OtherEngagements = otherEngagements,
		ReturnOnAreactionsdSpend = returnOnAreactionsdSpend,
		Sends = sends,
		Shares = shares,
		TextUrlClicks = textUrlClicks,
		TotalEngagements = totalEngagements,
		VideoCompletions = videoCompletions,
		VideoFirstQuartileCompletions = videoFirstQuartileCompletions,
		VideoMidpointCompletions = videoMidpointCompletions,
		VideoStarts = videoStarts,
		VideoThirdQuartileCompletions = videoThirdQuartileCompletions,
		VideoViews = videoViews,
		ViralCardClicks = viralCardClicks,
		ViralCardImpressions = viralCardImpressions,
		ViralClicks = viralClicks,
		ViralCommentLikes = viralCommentLikes,
		ViralComments = viralComments,
		ViralCompanyPageClicks = viralCompanyPageClicks,
		ViralExternalWebsiteConversions = viralExternalWebsiteConversions,
		ViralExternalWebsitePostClickConversions = viralExternalWebsitePostClickConversions,
		ViralExternalWebsitePostViewConversions = viralExternalWebsitePostViewConversions,
		ViralFollows = viralFollows,
		ViralFullScreenPlays = viralFullScreenPlays,
		ViralImpressions = viralImpressions,
		ViralLandingPageClicks = viralLandingPageClicks,
		ViralLikes = viralLikes,
		ViralOneClickLeadFormOpens = viralOneClickLeadFormOpens,
		ViralOneClickLeads = viralOneClickLeads,
		ViralOtherEngagements = viralOtherEngagements,
		ViralReactions = viralReactions,
		ViralShares = viralShares,
		ViralTotalEngagements = viralTotalEngagements,
		ViralVideoCompletions = viralVideoCompletions,
		ViralVideoFirstQuartileCompletions = viralVideoFirstQuartileCompletions,
		ViralVideoMidpointCompletions = viralVideoMidpointCompletions,
		ViralVideoStarts = viralVideoStarts,
		ViralVideoThirdQuartileCompletions = viralVideoThirdQuartileCompletions,
		ViralVideoViews = viralVideoViews,
		Reactions = reactions
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> AdvertismentDetailLinkedin
